fields.title: Cornflakes Breakfast
fields.description: A simple breakfast with Kellogg's Cornflakes and milk.
fields.instructions: Pour Kellogg's Cornflakes into a bowl, add cold whole milk, and enjoy.

fields.title: Tuna Sandwich
fields.description: A quick and tasty tuna sandwich.
fields.instructions: Mix tuna with mayonnaise and seasonings, then place between slices of bread.

fields.title: Oatmeal
fields.description: Warm oatmeal with milk and a touch of sugar.
fields.instructions: Cook oats with whole milk on low heat. Stir in a little sugar and serve warm.

fields.title: Scrambled Eggs
fields.description: Fluffy scrambled eggs made with butter.
fields.instructions: Beat eggs, add a pinch of salt and pepper, and cook slowly in butter until softly scrambled.

fields.title: Peanut Butter Toast
fields.description: A quick snack of toast with peanut butter.
fields.instructions: Toast bread and spread peanut butter over it. Enjoy immediately.

fields.title: Fruit Salad
fields.description: A refreshing mix of assorted fruits.
fields.instructions: Chop up pineapple, mango, strawberries, and blueberries. Mix and serve chilled.

fields.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
fields.description: A classic grilled cheese sandwich with cheddar.
fields.instructions: Butter two slices of bread, add cheddar cheese between them, and grill until golden.

fields.title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
fields.description: Simple spaghetti with garlic, olive oil, and basil.
fields.instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente. Saut√© garlic in olive oil, add red onions and basil, then toss with spaghetti.

fields.title: Chicken Salad
fields.description: A light chicken salad with fresh vegetables.
fields.instructions: Mix sliced chicken breast with chopped tomatoes, red onions, lettuce, olive oil, salt, and pepper.

fields.title: Vegetable Soup
fields.description: A hearty soup with fresh vegetables.
fields.instructions: Simmer carrots, potatoes, celery, and broccoli in broth with salt and pepper until tender.
